Deployment

  • Heroku - Cloud platform as a service (PaaS) supporting several programming languages.
  • Amazon Web Services (AWS) - On-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs.
  • Google Cloud Platform - Suite of cloud computing services that runs on the same infrastructure that Google uses internally.
  • Microsoft Azure - Cloud computing service for building, testing, deploying, and managing applications and services.
  • DigitalOcean - Cloud infrastructure provider designed for developers.
  • Kubernetes - Open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
  • Docker - Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.
  • Ansible - Open-source software provisioning, configuration management, and application-deployment tool.
  • Terraform - Infrastructure as code software tool that provides a consistent CLI workflow to manage hundreds of cloud services.
  • Jenkins - Open-source automation server that helps to automate the parts of software development related to building, testing, and deploying.
  • PDQ Deploy - Software deployment tool that allows system administrators to silently install almost any application or patch to multiple Windows computers simultaneously.
  • SaltStack - Automation for cloud, server, and container provisioning.
  • Vagrant - Tool for building and managing virtual machine environments in a single workflow.
  • Puppet - Configuration management tool.
  • Chef - Infrastructure automation for cloud-native and legacy environments.
  • Linode - Cloud hosting for developers.
  • Rackspace - Managed cloud computing company.
  • IBM Cloud - Cloud computing platform and infrastructure from IBM.
  • OVHcloud - Cloud computing company.
  • Scaleway - Cloud services and bare metal servers.
  • 1&1 IONOS - Web hosting and cloud solutions.
  • HostGator - Web hosting services.
  • Bluehost - Web hosting services.
  • SiteGround - Web hosting services.
  • DreamHost - Web hosting services.
  • Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops - Virtualization solution for application and desktop delivery.
  • Microsoft Hyper-V - Virtualization platform from Microsoft.
  • Proxmox VE - Open-source virtualization management platform.
  • Nutanix AHV - Enterprise virtualization solution, part of the Nutanix Acropolis system.

Virtualization

  • VMware - Virtualization and cloud computing software provider.
  • VirtualBox - Free, open-source hosted hypervisor for x86 virtualization.
  • Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops - Virtualization solution for application and desktop delivery.
  • Red Hat Virtualization - Open-source virtualization platform.
  • Microsoft Hyper-V - Virtualization platform from Microsoft.
  • Proxmox VE - Open-source virtualization management platform.
  • Nutanix AHV - Enterprise virtualization solution, part of the Nutanix Acropolis system.
  • Parallels Desktop - Software providing hardware virtualization for Macintosh computers with Intel processors.
  • KVM - Open-source virtualization technology built into Linux.
  • QEMU - Generic and open-source machine emulator and virtualizer.

Penetration Testing

  • Acunetix - Web vulnerability scanner.
  • Aircrack-ng - Suite of tools for assessing Wi-Fi network security.
  • Bugcrowd - Crowdsourced security platform.
  • Burp Suite - Software for web security testing.
  • Exploit Database - Archive of public exploits and corresponding vulnerable software.
  • GoBuster - Tool used to brute-force URIs (directories and files) in web sites and DNS subdomains (with wildcard support).
  • Hack The Box - Online platform to test and advance penetration testing skills.
  • HackerOne - Vulnerability coordination and bug bounty platform.
  • Hack This Site - Training ground for hackers.
  • John the Ripper - Password cracking software tool.
  • Kali Linux - Linux distribution designed for digital forensics and penetration testing.
  • Maltego - Tool for graphical link analysis.
  • Metasploit - Framework for developing and executing exploit code against a remote target machine.
  • Nessus - Vulnerability scanner.
  • Nmap - Network discovery and security auditing.
  • Offensive Security - Training and certifications in penetration testing.
  • OWASP - Open-source application security project.
  • PortSwigger - Burp Suite - Integrated platform for performing security testing of web applications.
  • Pentest-Tools.com - Online penetration testing and ethical hacking tools.
  • PentesterLab - Platform to learn web hacking.
  • PortSwigger - Web security learning resources and tools.
  • Phrack Magazine - One of the longest running hacker zines.
  • Rapid7 - Security data and analytics solutions.
  • SANS Institute - Research and education organization for security professionals.
  • Security Weekly - Podcast network covering various topics in security.
  • sqlmap - Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool.
  • Tenable Ness

  • Shodan - Search engine for Internet-connected devices.

  • Bellingcat - Independent investigative journalism collective focused on online open-source investigation.
  • Maltego - Tool for graphical link analysis.
  • Recorded Future - Threat intelligence powered by machine learning.
  • Intel Techniques - Tools, techniques, and resources for cyber intelligence.
  • Have I Been Pwned - Check if your email or phone is in a data breach.
  • Censys - Search engine for the data of the Internet's infrastructure.
  • TinEye - Reverse image search engine.
  • Pipl - People search engine.
  • Hunchly - Web capture tool for OSINT investigations.
  • Humintell - Tools and training for facial expression recognition.
